attributes.action: A referendum for independence from Scotland for Perth and Kinross
attributes.additional_details: I believe the region of Perth and Kinross has the right to choose if it wants to remain part of Scotland or the the rest of the UK.
attributes.background: I would like the right to choose if Perth and Kinross wants to stay part of Scotland or the rest of the UK

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action, and we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

Scotland is still a part of the UK, so it's not clear what you want people to vote on in any referendum.
